human.description: Following Rapino et al. 2013 i will control timepoints by FACS at 1d.2d.3d.4d.5d.6d.7d
3 runs in the machine= 3 technical replicates We rerun these samples in same machine as 3rd biological replicate to have two comparable biological replicates for the analysis
